name: metadata-remote
tagline: A self-hosted service for fetching and caching media metadata
description: Metadata Remote is a self-hosted backend for fetching and serving TV and movie metadata for media servers. It supports integrations with Plex, Emby, or Jellyfin and allows local caching of metadata.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Store metadata locally to reduce external API calls and improve performance

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Connect with Plex, Emby, or Jellyfin to provide metadata services

features.title: Poster And Artwork
features.description: Download and serve cover art, posters, and background images for media

features.title: Cast And Crew Data
features.description: Provide actor, director, and production information for media items

features.title: Api Compatibility
features.description: Implement standard metadata API protocols for seamless media server integration
